Summary: Went straight, slowly, brightened a lot then faded while moving.
divs: sighting detailsi was recording a video of a storm cloud full of lightning to the north of us and as i was recording, i saw a strange orb\light appear near the cloud and brighten slowly until it hit a peak brightness then faded as it moved. i thought it was an airplane but there were no flashing lights, only a single bright light that eventually disappeared. i also thought it was a shooting star but it was very slow and not like any shooting stars i've seen. it moved slowly upward as it also brightened then faded. i was perplexed but also excited because i was recording a video at the time that i saw the ufo. it faded from sight after about 20 seconds. in the attached video, you can see the orb appear at about 1:36 and brighten for several seconds. you can't tell that it was moving because the camera was out of focus and it didn't move a whole lot. excuse my embarrassing voice...
